title: ADC Ezreal Being Nerfed... Again...
body:
Okay, so WHY is Ezreal getting the short end of the stick with this preseason change to Marksmen? All of them are getting buffed to what they do best, but Ezreal is getting smacked in the face and completely ignored...

With this new patch, Marksmen are getting more reliant on the Crit stat and their items as well as their kits are getting boosts affected by crits, but EZREAL DOESN'T USE CRIT. Yet again we overlook Ezreal for the millionth time when it comes the ADC role. Not long ago, Riot was looking at ways to buff Ezreal in the ADC position and even upped the AP ratio on the Q to make the Trinity a better item, but now the AP is being removed, so that early AP it used to give is no longer going to be part of his kit. He's a poke-based ADC that gets outclassed late game, and even more-so with how powerful this patch is going to make the other ADC's.

Can we please stop gutting ADC Ezreal every single time there's talk of buffs for him? It's getting a bit annoying. He got his deserved nerfs during Preseason of Season 3 and he was then taken a whole new build that got nerfed into the floor, so he's been back to the old build... But now his items are being changed. Trinity is being changed to more crit-using champions plus the AP removed and now even Essence Reaver is being changed so that he can't even use it properly. It only procs off of crits! Seriously! 

Every season Ezreal gets a new item and then it gets ripped out of his hands. S3 gave him blue build, they made sure he couldn't. He went with Statikk Shiv, then that only crit if the thing that proc'd it crit.... Then Trinity got buffed so him and Corki could make a come back and in reality, only Corki was able to come back with it. We had Essence added and it was meant for champs like him, Jayce, and other AA'ing champs who use a lot of mana, but now he can't even use it.

Can we please make crit affect Ezreal's Q or something or revert some of these changes so Ezreal can at least cling to the small bit of life he still has? :(

No, the new Ez is going to be horrible.

Trinity doesn't give AP, gives less AD, and less AS, but has 10% crit, a stat that's near wasted on him.
